devon_goods.description: A package that contains DEVONâ€™s machine parts.

diglett_candy.description: A candy that is packed with energy. When given to certain Pokémon, it will increase all their stats at once.

dynite_ore.description: Mysterious ore that can be obtained in the Max Lair. Something good will happen if you give it to a collector in the Crown Tundra.
dynite_ore.name: Dynite Ore

earth_plate.description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It is a stone tablet that boosts the power of Ground-type moves.
earth_plate.name: Earth Plate

eevee_candy.description: A candy that is packed with energy. When given to certain Pokémon, it will increase all their stats at once.
eevee_candy.name: Eevee Candy

eevium_z__bag.description: It converts Z-Power into crystals that upgrade Eeveeâ€™s Last Resort to an exclusive Z-Move.
eevium_z__bag.name: Eevium Z  Bag

eevium_z__held.description: This is a crystallized form of Z-Power. It upgrades Eeveeâ€™s Last Resort to a Z-Move.
eevium_z__held.name: Eevium Z  Held

eject_button.description: If the holder is hit by an attack, it will switch with another Pokémon in your party.
eject_button.name: Eject Button

eject_pack.description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. When the holderâ€™s stats are lowered, it will be switched out of battle.
eject_pack.name: Eject Pack

ekans_candy.description: A candy that is packed with energy. When given to certain Pokémon, it will increase all their stats at once.
ekans_candy.name: Ekans Candy

electabuzz_candy.description: A candy that is packed with energy. When given to certain Pokémon, it will increase all their stats at once.
electabuzz_candy.name: Electabuzz Candy

electirizer.description: A box packed with a tremendous amount of electric energy. It is loved by a certain Pokémon.
electirizer.name: Electirizer

electric_gem.description: A gem with an essence of electricity. When held, it strengthens the power of an Electric-type move only once.
electric_gem.name: Electric Gem

electric_memory.description: A memory disc that contains Electric-type data. It changes the type of the holder if held by a certain species of Pokémon.
electric_memory.name: Electric Memory

electric_seed.description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It boosts Defense on Electric Terrain. It can only be used once.
electric_seed.name: Electric Seed

electrium_z__bag.description: It converts Z-Power into crystals that upgrade Electric-type moves to Electric-type Z-Moves.
electrium_z__bag.name: Electrium Z  Bag

electrium_z__held.description: This is a crystallized form of Z-Power. It upgrades Electric-type moves to Z-Moves.
electrium_z__held.name: Electrium Z  Held

elevator_key.description: A card key that activates the elevator in Lysandre Labs. It is emblazoned with Team Flareâ€™s logo.
elevator_key.name: Elevator Key

elixir.description: Restores the PP of all moves by 10.
elixir.name: Elixir

endorsement.description: A letter of recommendation that youâ€™ll need in order to participate in the Gym Challenge.
endorsement.name: Endorsement

energy_powder.description: A bitter powder that restores HP by 50 points.
energy_powder.name: Energy Powder

energy_root.description: A bitter root that restores HP by 200 points.
energy_root.name: Energy Root

enigma_berry.description: POKÃ©BLOCK ingredient. Plant in loamy soil to grow a mystery.
enigma_berry.name: Enigma Berry

enigma_stone.description: A crystal ball that was excavated from the ground. A very beautiful stone that is covered with bits of rock and earth.
enigma_stone.name: Enigma Stone

enigmatic_card.description: A mysterious card. Written on it is a request for you to go to a guest room in an Akala motel on Route 8.
enigmatic_card.name: Enigmatic Card

eon_flute.description: A flute that can be used to summon Latios or Latias no matter where you are.
eon_flute.name: Eon Flute

eon_ticket.description: The ticket for a ferry to a distant southern island.
eon_ticket.name: Eon Ticket

escape_rope.description: Use to escape instantly from a cave or a dungeon.
escape_rope.name: Escape Rope

ether.description: Restores the PP of a selected move by 10.
ether.name: Ether

everstone.description: A wondrous stone & a hold item that prevents evolution.
everstone.name: Everstone

eviolite.description: A mysterious evolutionary lump. When held, it raises the Defense and Sp. Def of a Pokémon that can still evolve.
eviolite.name: Eviolite

exeggcute_candy.description: A candy that is packed with energy. When given to certain Pokémon, it will increase all their stats at once.
exeggcute_candy.name: Exeggcute Candy

exp_candy_s.name: Exp Candy S

exp_candy_xl.name: Exp Candy Xl

exp_candy_xs.description: A candy that is packed with energy. When consumed, it will grant a single Pokémon a very small amount of Exp. Points.
exp_candy_xs.name: Exp Candy Xs
